title: 【頂置】聖誕攬炒行動po終於出爐

replies.msg:
【正式宣佈】 12.25 SUCK the Christmas
聖誕三部曲行動





琴日出過PO就長話短說
https://lihkg.com/thread/1785327/page/1

--- 我係分隔線 ---

黑警叫我地Call耶穌落黎見佢
聖誕我地就召換耶穌降臨
成全你
POPO想呃OT賺錢
政府捱住財赤都仲要俾你呃錢
成全你

我地堅持行街唔須要班狗批准
所以係唔會入紙
大家到時現場請自由發揮
「點慶祝, 唔洗你教」
「蒙面唔洗你批準」
「行街 都唔洗你批準」


遊行完之後番入各區商場
進行藍店抵制活動
㩒晒啲攞位飛+用飛仔串成紙條+口號window shopping
坐到full house但唔落order

推薦地點 : MOKO , 新城市 , POPCORN

特別challenge request : 用飛仔推個大雪人出黎

同時
聖誕邊少得禮物！
我地誠邀各方家長、街坊
齊齊聖誕節出嚟派聖誕禮物俾各位小朋友
不論係保暖既衫、用品、道具或者任何你想俾佢地既野

Telegram post : https://t.me/stuckwithyou/9845

Facebook Post : https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=138812397578587&id=104901334303027

Instagram post : https://www.instagram.com/p/B6I-80Xnwpe/?igshid=v1wxkqgmnt9m


SUCK哨兵公會將正式運作支援本次行動
為大家提供哨料 : t.me/suck_sentinel_channel

SUCK Channel : t.me/stuckwithyou

#2為英文版

Dec.25 SUCK the Christmas
The Christmas Trilogy






How could we ever let Christmas slide? The day Christ was born is a big deal!

PoPo said they want to meet our Maker. He comes today, be our guest!
PoPo you want to scam for extra-hour pay despite the reserve crunch? Be our guest!

I'm dreaming of a Suck......Christmas!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Solo - The Christmas Dress-up Walk



Venue:
Lan Kwai Fong, Central
Lee Tung Street, Wanchai
East Point Road, Causeway Bay
Canton Road, Tsim Sha Tsui East
Sai Yeung Choi Street South, Mong Kok
Tam Kon Po Street, Shatin

When: Whenever! Come and Go as you please


You don't need an approval to go out and about, that's why we're not going to get one.
Get Creative!
"Ain't nobody gonna tell me how to celebrate Christmas"
"Don't need no permission to mask up"
"Don't need no permission to walk"

There's a thing for everyone on Christmas Day
- Pedestrian zone man-drawn sledge race (reindeer costume optional)
- Line up and form a street size sleigh (when viewed from above)
- Busking and Carolling
- Dress up for photos, Lennon-esque Santa, Reindeer, human Christmas tree, Christmas log, snowflakes and elves, you name it!
- Have a chat with your friendly tourist, walk around with a poster

Seize every chance for photos, pictures, publicity and posters.
The more the Merrier!


--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Duet - Masked Shopping Spree



Boo if it's Blue in the shopping mall of your choosing, from 4pm onwards
Empty out the seating tickets and string them up, belt out your chants, go window shopping
Fill up the restaurants and take your sweet time in placing your order, if at all

Sommelier's Choice: Maxim's, MTR malls
Mall d'jour: MOKO, New Town Plaza Shatin, Popcorn

Do you want to build a snowman? We challenge you to build one with seating tickets!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Trio - Christmas Presents



No Christmas is complete without presents!
Join in and spread the love, be it warm clothing, "gears and toys", or anything you fancy. Sharing is caring!

All I want for Christmas, is SUCK!!!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
P.S. Rupert Dover walks on water, Fa-lalalala la-la F*** You you Snowflake!
Oh and Dave Jordan, Merry Christmas you Filthy Animal!


Telegram post (eng) : https://t.me/stuckwithyou/9858

Facebook post (eng) : https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=139080437551783&id=104901334303027

Instagram post (eng) : https://www.instagram.com/p/B6K0hSnHAUu/?igshid=og0wg5ct9hwr


Telegram channel : t.me/stuckwithyou

想多啲人參與行動？

要記住嚟場革命唔係淨係屬於後生仔
四五十歲既人多數淨係上fb 佢地好多時都想參與行動 但又唔知有咩日程

我地有咩可以做？

1）我地要多啲係fb唔同post下面瘋狂洗版行動文宣
2）仲有要係街不斷airdrop啲文宣俾人製造抗爭氣氛
3）隨身袋住啲文宣周街貼

唔好淨係依賴文宣組
頭兩項都係零成本
你唔係唔做呀嘛

聖誕三部曲行動





琴日出過PO就長話短說
https://lihkg.com/thread/1785327/page/1

--- 我係分隔線 ---

黑警叫我地Call耶穌落黎見佢
聖誕我地就召換耶穌降臨
成全你
POPO想呃OT賺錢
政府捱住財赤都仲要俾你呃錢
成全你

我地堅持行街唔須要班狗批准
所以係唔會入紙
大家到時現場請自由發揮
「點慶祝, 唔洗你教」
「蒙面唔洗你批準」
「行街 都唔洗你批準」


遊行完之後番入各區商場
進行藍店抵制活動
㩒晒啲攞位飛+用飛仔串成紙條+口號window shopping
坐到full house但唔落order

推薦地點 : MOKO , 新城市 , POPCORN

特別challenge request : 用飛仔推個大雪人出黎

同時
聖誕邊少得禮物！
我地誠邀各方家長、街坊
齊齊聖誕節出嚟派聖誕禮物俾各位小朋友
不論係保暖既衫、用品、道具或者任何你想俾佢地既野

quote.msg:
#2為英文版

Dec.25 SUCK the Christmas
The Christmas Trilogy






How could we ever let Christmas slide? The day Christ was born is a big deal!

PoPo said they want to meet our Maker. He comes today, be our guest!
PoPo you want to scam for extra-hour pay despite the reserve crunch? Be our guest!

I'm dreaming of a Suck......Christmas!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Solo - The Christmas Dress-up Walk



Venue:
Lan Kwai Fong, Central
Lee Tung Street, Wanchai
East Point Road, Causeway Bay
Canton Road, Tsim Sha Tsui East
Sai Yeung Choi Street South, Mong Kok
Tam Kon Po Street, Shatin

When: Whenever! Come and Go as you please


You don't need an approval to go out and about, that's why we're not going to get one.
Get Creative!
"Ain't nobody gonna tell me how to celebrate Christmas"
"Don't need no permission to mask up"
"Don't need no permission to walk"

There's a thing for everyone on Christmas Day
- Pedestrian zone man-drawn sledge race (reindeer costume optional)
- Line up and form a street size sleigh (when viewed from above)
- Busking and Carolling
- Dress up for photos, Lennon-esque Santa, Reindeer, human Christmas tree, Christmas log, snowflakes and elves, you name it!
- Have a chat with your friendly tourist, walk around with a poster

Seize every chance for photos, pictures, publicity and posters.
The more the Merrier!


--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Duet - Masked Shopping Spree



Boo if it's Blue in the shopping mall of your choosing, from 4pm onwards
Empty out the seating tickets and string them up, belt out your chants, go window shopping
Fill up the restaurants and take your sweet time in placing your order, if at all

Sommelier's Choice: Maxim's, MTR malls
Mall d'jour: MOKO, New Town Plaza Shatin, Popcorn

Do you want to build a snowman? We challenge you to build one with seating tickets!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Trio - Christmas Presents



No Christmas is complete without presents!
Join in and spread the love, be it warm clothing, "gears and toys", or anything you fancy. Sharing is caring!

All I want for Christmas, is SUCK!!!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
P.S. Rupert Dover walks on water, Fa-lalalala la-la F*** You you Snowflake!
Oh and Dave Jordan, Merry Christmas you Filthy Animal!


Telegram post (eng) : https://t.me/stuckwithyou/9858

Facebook post (eng) : https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=139080437551783&id=104901334303027

Instagram post (eng) : https://www.instagram.com/p/B6K0hSnHAUu/?igshid=og0wg5ct9hwr


Telegram channel : t.me/stuckwithyou

【正式宣佈】 12.25 SUCK the Christmas
聖誕三部曲行動





琴日出過PO就長話短說
https://lihkg.com/thread/1785327/page/1

--- 我係分隔線 ---

黑警叫我地Call耶穌落黎見佢
聖誕我地就召換耶穌降臨
成全你
POPO想呃OT賺錢
政府捱住財赤都仲要俾你呃錢
成全你

我地堅持行街唔須要班狗批准
所以係唔會入紙
大家到時現場請自由發揮
「點慶祝, 唔洗你教」
「蒙面唔洗你批準」
「行街 都唔洗你批準」


遊行完之後番入各區商場
進行藍店抵制活動
㩒晒啲攞位飛+用飛仔串成紙條+口號window shopping
坐到full house但唔落order

推薦地點 : MOKO , 新城市 , POPCORN

特別challenge request : 用飛仔推個大雪人出黎

同時
聖誕邊少得禮物！
我地誠邀各方家長、街坊
齊齊聖誕節出嚟派聖誕禮物俾各位小朋友
不論係保暖既衫、用品、道具或者任何你想俾佢地既野

replies.msg: 光復香港 時代革命
五大訴求缺一不可光復香港時代革命香港獨立

POPO strategy today
其實冇部署，忠誠勇毅嘅佢哋係唔怕經濟攬炒
怕經濟攬炒嘅只係施生陳生嗰啲收成期買晒鋪嘅人
呢個係上面嘅指令
佢地只會不斷咁樣irritate你
每隔一段時間就會irritate你
目的係想你哋開花，捉晒有膽量行動嘅人
剩返嗰啲今時今日都冇膽行出嚟嘅，將來23條呀國歌戲出咗之後更加唔會夠膽出聲，所以嗰啲人響上面來講係廢嘅，上面覺得只要捉實夠膽行出黎嘅就代表成功

2. 有人受傷究竟可唔可以喚醒啲人or 輸出革命？遙遠有集中營嘅地方有人自焚有人俾人強姦有人俾人殺，兼且佢哋好齊心，佢哋而家成功咗未？

3. 其實我寫呢句出嚟係想同大家講,和你shop你只要夠多人,去啲鋪頭睇下野,靜靜地已經可以達致你當初想經濟攬炒嘅目的唔需要咁樣正面的diu狗,太揚啦，POPO 嘅接到order 嘅我point 1 已經講咗
琴日嗰兩個跌落樓嘅大命，戰場上希望大家有個安全聖誕
